trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SEQ_00<tab>Your body odor has caught Sumitsubo's attention.
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SUMITSUBO_000_000<tab>Hmm...? <sniff> You smell of fish. Does this mean, then, that you're a fisher from above?
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SUMITSUBO_000_001<tab>If you enjoy hunting fish up there, then I'm sure you would take pleasure in hunting them down here as well.

TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SUMITSUBO_000_002<tab>You cannot use rods and reels underwater, though. No, you will need a spear to strike your prey swiftly and silently like the Kojin. I suppose you would call it...spearfishing?
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SUMITSUBO_000_003<tab>Would you like a lesson in spearfishing? If you should see any of my Blue brothers outside, I'm sure they would be glad to show you how it's done.
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SUMITSUBO_000_010<tab>A hunter who smells of fish like you should take to spearfishing like Kojin to water. I'm certain my Blue brothers would be more than happy to show you how.

TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_KOUJIN02922_000_020<tab>You wish to hunt fish with a spear? Why, it's as easy as breathing underwater. And considering you're not blue in the face, I can tell you will master this skill in no time at all.

TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_KOUJIN02922_000_021<tab>First, you will need to search for where fish gather. When you've found a suitable school of fish, steady your spear and strike with a quick and fluid thrust.
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_KOUJIN02922_000_022<tab>That, in a clamshell, is the art of spearfishing. Of course, these explanations mean nothing if you have no spear to practice. Here, take one of mine.
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_KOUJIN02922_000_023<tab>If you look around, you're like to find promising prey close by. Farewell, friend, and happy hunting.
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>You are now able to obtain fish via spearfishing. In order to do so, you must first equip a spearfishing gig as your secondary tool.
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SYSTEM_100_050<tab>By using the action Fathom, you will be able to locate teeming waters as you explore the ocean.
TEXT_STMBDY104_02922_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>With your spearfishing gig in hand, you can interact with these teeming waters to catch fish.
